actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT DATE_TRUNC('month', view_date) AS timestamp, 
count(Distinct CASE WHEN view_date >= '{{End_date.selectedDate}}':: date - interval '1 years' 
  		AND view_date < '{{End_date.selectedDate}}':: date 
	  THEN video_id ELSE NULL END) as COUNT_CURRENT,
count(Distinct CASE WHEN view_date >= '{{End_date.selectedDate}}':: date - interval '2 years'
  		AND view_date < '{{End_date.selectedDate}}':: date - interval '1 years' 
	  THEN video_id ELSE NULL END) as COUNT_Last	  
FROM public."smg_dmp_fb_video_dashboard_unq" WHERE
view_date > '{{End_date.selectedDate}}':: date - interval '2 years'
  AND view_date < '{{End_date.selectedDate}}':: date AND(
	name like {{Domain_select.selectedOptionValue ? Domain_select.selectedOptionValue : "%"}})
 GROUP BY
  timestamp
order by timestamp DESC	
limit 15;
